mailer.upload:
康老師您好，系統中有一份新文件等待簽核，請撥空查閱ELIMT電子系統

You have a document to be signed, please check the ELIMT system
mailer.approve:
您上傳於系統中的文件已被簽核通過，相關紀錄請查閱ELIMT電子系統

The document you uploaded had been approve, for more inforamtion please check the ELIMT system
mailer.reject:
您上傳於系統中的文件已被拒絕通過，相關紀錄請查閱ELIMT電子系統

The document you uploaded had been reject, for more inforamtion please check the ELIMT system
